1.name: Grunt
1.desc: A simple creature that whacks things with its fists.

2.name: Snowman
2.desc: A horrible ghoul using a festive guise.

3.name: Monkey
3.desc: This wily primate loves to trick unsuspecting explorers!

4.name: Hog
4.desc: Those cute, chubby jowls hide its razor sharp tusks.

5.name: Solar 'Naut
5.desc: An advanced cosmonaut who has harnessed the power of solar rays.

6.name: Solar Knot
6.desc: A garlic knot empored by the solar rays of the stars.

7.name: Hollow
7.desc: For each soul the attacking player holds, this gains +1 attack.

8.name: Grave Stomper
8.desc: When this is defeated, you may force a player to discard one Ware of their choosing.

9.name: The Tomb
9.desc: When this is defeated, kill an enemy (non boss) or player of your choosing.

10.name: Hexed Soul
10.desc: Roll a die: 1-3; The soul is destroyed, 4-6; collect this soul.

11.name: Foul Trick
11.desc: Roll a die: 1-2; +1β, 3-4; take 2 damage, 5-6; Gain 2 wares. (If the Moon Jester is in play, you may discard this and deal 2 damage to it. Note that this will start combat).

12.name: Voodoo Dog
12.desc: If this takes damage, the attacking player must roll 3+ to avoid taking damage.

13.name: Something Horrid This Way Comes
13.desc: When this is defeated, if the next monster drawn is a boss, claim one additional Relic.

14.name: The Walls Move
14.desc: When this is defeated, add a monster slot.

15.name: Mimic
15.desc: If this damages the attacking player, they must add one Ware of their choosing to this monster's reward.

16.name: Plague Treasure
16.desc: Roll a die: 1-3; Take 2 damage, 4-6; +1 Relic

17.name: Bomb Bones
17.desc: When this is defeated, roll a die: 1-2; take 1 damage, 3-4; Inflict 1 damage on a player of your choosing, 5-6; Inflict 1 damage to an enemy of your choosing.

18.name: George
18.desc: When this is drawn, it will leave after all players have had a turn. 4β: +2 Wares, 10β: +2 Relics, 20β: +1 Soul.

19.name: Spectre
19.desc: This can only be damaged by an odd number roll. Even numbers miss.

20.name: Ghoul
20.desc: This can only be damaged by an even number roll. Odd numbers miss.

21.name: Smile!
21.desc: When this is defeated, you may pick another player's Ware at random to clone for yourself.

22.name: Booby trap
22.desc: Roll a die: 1; Take 1 damage, 2-6; rather pleasant experience.

24.name: Hurtling bone
24.desc: Roll a die: 1; OUCH, who threw that? (take 1 damage), 2-6; conveniently duck for the shiny object you found on the ground (+1β)

25.name: Bone Golem
25.desc: A large construct made of bone.

26.name: Watchful
26.desc: No Wares may be played during this fight.

27.name: Goliath Scarab
27.desc: This hulking insect has lost its ability to become jewelry. Takes no damage on a roll of 6.

28.name: Ethereal Network Cord Snake
28.desc: This strange creature came to life one day in an abandoned server room and has been on the loose ever since. Watch out for its sharp prongs!

29.name: Dumpster Dive
29.desc: When Revealed: All players may play an additional Ware in response to this.
29.reward: +2 Wares to the player who revealed this.

30.name: Pit of a Thousand Trials.
30.desc: Discard all active enemies and draw new ones until a boss slots into all of them. You may attack as many times as you want till the end of your turn.

31.name: Texan Engineer
31.desc: Items that increase ATK is ineffective when fighting this. When defeated the active player may recharge all of their items. "Hey look buddy..."

32.name: Scottish Swordsman
32.desc: If this kills a player, they lose 1 soul.

33.name: The Strongman
33.desc: If this is not in combat: you may vote to discard this.

34.name: Ogre
34.desc: "You feel layers of fear set upon you."

35.name: Mucus Monster
35.desc: Does not take damage on rolls of 3. "A gelatinous monster made of snot."

36.name: Back door
36.desc: Add a new enemy slot to the board.

37.name: Spider
37.desc: "Don't let that spider bite ya, spider bite hurt."

38.name: Funny clown
38.desc: "Why does he keep dancing and saying his name?"

39.name: Rolly polly
39.desc: When this is active you may only attack this. Only deals damage on rolls less than 2.

40.name: Plot Armour
40.desc: While active all active enemies gain +1 RR. This can not be attacked, but is discarded if an enemy is defeated.

41.name: Thieving Robot
41.desc: If a player activated a relic while this is active they must discard a Ware.

42.name: Schizophrenic Shopkeep
42.desc: When revealed, roll: 4-6: add a new slot to the shop. 1-3: Die.

43.name: Seductive Robot
43.desc: On attack rolls of 6 combat ends. Damage dealt to this is reduced to 1.

44.name: Virus
44.desc: When defeated, roll: 1-3: Add a Jinx to the board. 4-6: Nothing.

45.name: Warden
45.desc: When defeated, you may add a new active enemy slot to the board.

48.name: Buzzing Puppet
48.desc: "The fear grows as the vibrations grow near."

50.name: Tub Bug
50.desc: You may pet this and gain 1β once per turn

51.name: Gilded Tub Bug
51.desc: You may pet this and gain 2β once per turn

52.name: Vampire
52.desc: Does not take damage on rolls of 6. When dealing damage, this heals +1 HP.
52.reward: Steal 1 Ware from another player (They must reveal their hand to you).

53.name: Sentient Dryer
53.desc: "Hope your clothes are machine dryer safe"

54.name: Eyes that Judge
54.desc: While active, you can not purchase any items from the shop.

55.name: Automagical Golem
55.desc: The eyes are like spotlights that look down on me"

56.name: Schlump
56.desc: If not in combat, once per turn you may roll: 1-5: Nothing. 6: Gain +1 Ware.

57.name: Offensive Origami
57.desc: "Folded up slurs, hate speech, and propaganda."

58.name: Lawyer
58.desc: Lose half your β Rounded up.

59.name: Buff Shroom
59.desc: "A spore to stomp you to the floor."

60.name: Rock
60.desc: "It's not just a boulder! its a Rock!"

63.name: Ballguy
63.desc: When this dies, roll: 1-2: Nothing. 3-4: Attacking player takes 1 damage. 5-6: All players take 1 damage.

64.name: Melting Experiment
64.desc: On death, this deals 1 damage to all players and active enemies.

65.name: Living Factory
65.desc: When this dies, expand the active monster slots by 2. You must fight again this turn.

66.name: Assassin
66.desc: When revealed, gains +1 ATK & RR until the end of the turn.

67.name: Laser Crystal
67.desc: On a roll of 6, cancel the attack and fight another active enemy.

68.name: Cockatrice
68.desc: If you roll a 3 while fighting this, die.

69.name: Roid Raccoon
69.desc: His addiction began when he found a trash can full of needles.

70.name: Wasteland Robot
70.desc: Gains +1 ATK each time it takes damage.

71.name: Sentient Beartrap
71.desc: All players have -1 to attack rolls while this is active.

72.name: Haunted Piano
72.desc: Gains +1 ATK and RR at 2 HP.

73.name: Warehouse
73.desc: When this is revealed, all players gain 1 Ware.

74.name: Monk-Eye
74.desc: "Trained in the ancient monkey way, he has abstained from just being an observer!"

75.name: Marble Goddess
75.desc: All jinxes are discarded in its presence.

76.name: Divine Intervention
76.desc: Players vote to remove a jinx, if there are no jinxes then this removes the next jinx put on the board.

77.name: Osmosis Homunculus
77.desc: When revealed this "absorbs" all enemies on the board. This cannot be discarded and no other enemies may be drawn or fought. When this is defeated max enemy count is reduced to 2.
77.reward: The drops of the absorbed enemies including souls.

78.name: House Repainting
78.desc: When revealed, reduce the max enemy count down by 1. "Do the walls seem thicker to you?"

79.name: Cow
79.desc: Heals 2 health after every 2 attack rolls. "The Beggeter of Bovines"

80.name: Meet the Medic
80.desc: All players with Souls lose 1 Soul. Players with 0 Souls gain 1 Soul.

81.name: CONGA!
81.desc: All players roll. The highest roll gains a relic. Lowest roll gains 3 wares. Intermediate rolls gain +5β.

82.name: Underwater Adventure
82.desc: All players are reduced to 1 HP until the next stage change. All players gain a relic. "Wooooow."

1.name: Agreeable
1.mod: Copies ability of the attacking player.

2.name: Jinxed
2.mod: Puts a jinx on the board, which disappears when the enemy is defeated

5.name: Impatient
5.mod: If this is not defeated after 4 turns: Discard this.

17.name: Hasty
17.mod: If the player is damaged, roll 3+ to avoid a second attack.

19.name: Poor
19.mod: No rewards (excluding souls) may be taken after defeating this enemy.

29.name: Mutated
29.mod: Roll the dice to determine the prefix effect. 1: + 1 to all stats, 2: + 2 to HP, 3: + 2 to RR, 4: - 1 to RR, 5: - 1 to HP, 6: - 1 to all stats

30.name: Unwavering
30.mod: Is immune to Ware and Relic effects.

31.name: Unyielding
31.mod: Can only be killed by ware and relic effects.

33.name: Disastrous
33.mod: If this kills a player, all other players die, too.

34.name: Charging
34.mod: Can only be attacked at the start of a turn.

35.name: Ignorant
35.mod: Ignores the attacking player's stat changes.

36.name: Aroused
36.mod: If this is attacked, the attacking player takes 1 damage.

39.name: Unlucky
39.mod: Takes the oldest jinx currently on the board and discards it when this is defeated.

3.name: Of Trickery
3.mod: Dice rolls are inverted when fighting this

4.name: Of Illusion
4.mod: All dice rolls are inverted when this is on the board

7.name: The Generous
7.mod: Rewards (except souls) are given to ALL players.

8.name: The Peaceful
8.mod: After a successful attack roll, you have -1 to to the next attack roll.

10.name: The Engorged
10.mod: HP and rewards (excluding Souls) will double if this isn't attacked within 1 turn of it being revealed.

21.name: Of the Colosseum
21.mod: When this dies, you must fight another active enemy.

22.name: With RGB Support
22.mod: Drops an extra Relic upon death.

23.name: The Morbid
23.mod: Drops an extra Ware upon death.

24.name: Of Rebirth
24.mod: When this is revealed, discard and replace other active enemies.

25.name: The Vampiric
25.mod: Heals 1 HP from missed attack rolls. Drops an extra Ware upon death.

26.name: The Handholder
26.mod: This can only be targeted by the player with the least amount of β. Drops an extra 5β.

27.name: The Succubus
27.mod: When defeated, you may steal a soul another player owns.

28.name: The Soulless
28.mod: When defeated, you may destroy a soul another player owns.

29.name: The Defiler
29.mod: When this is defeated, you may force a player to discard a Relic.

35.name: The Adaptive
35.mod: Copies the attacking player's stat changes.

36.name: The Timebomb
36.mod: If this is not killed after a full turn cycle after its revealed, all players die.

37.name: #NaN
37.mod: When this dies, the active player gains a Glitch card.

1.name: Did I Roll Yet?
1.desc: The first roll on your turn is forgotten and must be rolled again.

2.name: Boneitis
2.desc: Lose 3β if you roll a 6.

3.name: Butterfingers
3.desc: Lose 1 Ware if you roll a 3.

4.name: Energy Crisis
4.desc: You may only recharge one Relic per turn.

5.name: Inaccuracy
5.desc: Successful attack rolls miss the targeted enemy and hit adjacent enemies.

6.name: Communism
6.desc: The player with the most β must give half, rounded up, to the player with the least β.

7.name: Dementia
7.desc: All players must discard a Relic. If you have no Relics, lose 1 Ware. This is immediately discarded.

8.name: Mass Atrophy
8.desc: All players and enemies have 1 ATK, no exeptions.

9.name: Midas' Crutch
9.desc: All gained bones are halved, rounded down. Instances of gaining 1β are forfeit.

10.name: Glass Bones and Paper Skin
10.desc: Relics can't be purchased and all players have -1 HP.

11.name: Ruinous Relics
11.desc: You must flip all but one Relic in your possession. These Relics can't be used until the Jinx is removed.

12.name: Bloodbath
12.desc: All enemy slots are filled and you must fight on your turn.

13.name: Free Parking
13.desc: All enemy rewards (except souls) are pooled together until this Jinx is removed. Upon removal, the rewards are divided evenly amongst the players.

14.name: Number of the Beast
14.desc: All rolls of 6 must be rerolled. If 6 is rolled 3 times in a row: all enemies  are killed and their rewards are given to the active player, discard this on that event.

15.name: Jinxes Make Us Jump for Joy
15.desc: Places two more Jinxes on the board. Removing this one will remove them both.

16.name: Event Horizon
16.desc: All players lose their souls. This is immediately discarded.

17.name: I see the stop sign, but I have to find an octagon!
17.desc: Permanently raises the win requirement to 8 souls. Even after discarding this.

18.name: Peripatetic
18.desc: Stage changes on every players turn

19.name: Thieves, Inc.
19.desc: All rewards (exept Souls) that are gained from killed enemies are instead stolen from other players.

20.name: Jelly of the Month Club
20.desc: All players discard their Bonus Souls, and cannot acquire them for the rest of the game. This is immediately discarded.

21.name: Black Market Deals
21.desc: Take 1 damage whenever you purchase a Relic.

22.name: Ugh, so Cliche
22.desc: Lose a Soul whenever you die. "If you die in the game, you die for real!"

23.name: I've fallen, and I can't get up!
23.desc: You have -1 to dice rolls when at 1 HP.

24.name: Artificial Difficulty
24.desc: All bosses have +2 HP and +1 ATK.

25.name: hex souls speedrun any%
25.desc: At the beginning of your turn, set a 3 minute timer. End your turn when you run out of time.

26.name: Improper Funding
26.desc: You can't gain Wares at the beginning of your turn. "We can't afford handouts."

27.name: Improper Funding II
27.desc: You can't gain extra health, and can only heal at the end of your turn. "Is anybody here a doctor?"

28.name: Zombie Apocalypse
28.desc: After killing an enemy and gaining its rewards, you must fight it again. Undead enemies have +2 HP and -1 to roll requirement, and drop no extra rewards. Can't be removed at the end of cycles.

29.name: Time and Space
29.desc: This Jinx does nothing. It exists solely to waste time pulling it out, and waste space on the board.

30.name: Viral Outbreak
30.desc: After 3 cycles around the board, add a new Jinx. The added Jinx then mutates into a different Jinx every 3 cycles around the board. Can't be removed at the end of cycles.

1.name: Empty Room
1.desc: The room is empty, no stage modifications will be applied.

2.name: Deep Dark
2.desc: Vision is difficult in such darkness, enemies have -1 to their RR. But, players also get -1 to all their combat rolls.

3.name: Holy Keep
3.desc: Jinxes are ineffective while in this stage.

4.name: Ancient Arena
4.desc: Players and enemies gain +1 ATK while in this stage.

5.name: Clover Fields
5.desc: You may reroll any one dice roll per turn while in this stage.

6.name: Enemy Portal-Gateway
6.desc: Adds a new active enemy slot, remove that slot when this is swapped for another stage.

7.name: Arcade
7.desc: Enemies drop an additional 2β on their death.

8.name: Royal Tomb
8.desc: At the start of your turn, gain a free relic. "it's not grave robbing, its re-utilizing."

9.name: Nudist Beach
9.desc: Passive relics are ineffective in this stage.

10.name: Casino
10.desc: You may only purchase relics off the top of the relic deck, but for an additional 10β you may purchase an additional relic.

11.name: Davy Jones' Locker
11.desc: If you die in this stage, you lose a soul.

12.name: Glass Galleon
12.desc: Souls dropped by enemies are x2 value. However, taking damage of any kind kills the player instantly.

13.name: Clearance Sale
13.desc: Gain an additional ware at the start of your turn in this stage.

14.name: Abandoned Missile Silo
14.desc: On an attack roll of 6, the attacking player and enemy both die and no rewards are gained. "Be veeerryyyy careful..."

17.name: Jail Cell
17.desc: If a player rolls the same number twice in a row, their turn ends.

18.name: The Pit
18.desc: You must fight on your turn.

19.name: Holy Cleansing Pool
19.desc: All active jinxes are must be discarded. If an event were to add a jinx to the board, it is ignored. "Hey, where are all the sexy mermaids?"

20.name: Vampire Den
20.desc: All enemies and players heal 1 HP upon a successful attack.

21.name: King's Arena
21.desc: Enemies drop no rewards. Bosses drop +1 Relic.

22.name: Wild West
22.desc: Armed with your trusty six-shooter, you have six attack rolls. If yer enemy ain't dead, time to hit the saddle, partner! (Cancel your attack)

23.name: Anonymous Image Board
23.desc: You can't affect other players with Wares, Relics, or enemy effects. "WHO ARE YOU PEOPLE!?"

24.name: The Dice Duke's Chambers
24.desc: For any dice roll, roll 2 dice, then pick the roll in your favor.

25.name: Brothel
25.desc: During your turn, you may spend 10β once to gain +1 HP permanently. "We can bone if you got the Bones."

26.name: Carousel of Aggress
26.desc: All active enemies are discarded and replaced at the end of each players' turn.

27.name: The Carnival
27.desc: At the start of your turn, roll: 1: Gain a Relic. 2: Gain a Ware. 3: +1 HP until the end of your turn. 4-6: -1 HP. "Sorry you broke your arm on the Scrambler, have a funnel cake."

28.name: The Bank
28.desc: You may insert any amount of β into the bank for safe keeping. If the Stage changes to The Bank on a different turn, you may withdraw double the β you deposited.

29.name: Kosmic Kitchen
29.desc: You may discard any amout of Wares to heal an equal amount HP. You may do this once on your turn. "We can cook anything here, as long as you give us the equivalent matter."

30.name: The Backrooms
30.desc: This Stage will not change at the next cycle, and can only be forced to change.

32.name: %MapName%
32.desc: All players draw a glitch card. If a player already owns a glitch card, exchange one of their choosing. "Now what's causing the issue?"

33.name: Gemini Inn
33.desc: When a boss is defeated, earn their rewards and end combat. Reset the boss instead of discarding it (Once per boss).

34.name: Imp Nest
34.desc: Imps passively gain: +1 to RR, -1 to ATK. "Kill it while it's still cute."

35.name: Ambrosia Lake
35.desc: No players or enemies can be killed this round.

36.name: Maze of Bank Statements
36.desc: No players or enemies may initiate combat. Gain +5β at the start of your turn. "It's time you took your mind off fighting and worry about your bookkeeping"

37.name: Blue Smog
37.desc: Players may charge any single item of their choosing on their turn. "Smell that? That's your motherboard taking its last breath."

1.name: Champion's Soul
1.desc: Kill 3 enemies on your turn.

2.name: Collector's Soul
2.desc: Be the first to collect 5 Relics.

3.name: Tycoon's Soul
3.desc: Be the first to have more than 100β.

4.name: Devestator's Soul
4.desc: Deal more than 4 damage in one move.

5.name: Survivor's Soul
5.desc: Don't die for 4 stages consecutively.

6.name: Traitor's Soul
6.desc: Be the first to kill another player.

7.name: Freebie Soul
7.desc: All players gain 1 soul this game, don't waste it.

9.name: Carrion's Soul
9.desc: Be the first to die 3 times.

10.name: Beggar's Soul
10.desc: End your turn with no wares, β, or Relics.

11.name: 0x00000000 EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION
11.desc: Be the first to gain a Glitched card.

13.name: Gunslinger's Soul
13.desc: Eliminate a boss on your first attack.

14.name: Regicide Soul
14.desc: Eliminate two Imp gaurds and the Queen.

15.name: Fool's Soul
15.desc: Eliminate the Moon Jester with the "Foul Trick".

16.name: Sharpshooter's Soul
16.desc: Miss 6 times in a row on your turn. "And then I missed."

17.name: Hex Soul
17.desc: Kill an enemy with 6 HP, or an enemy with the "hexed" prefix.

18.name: Soulless Soul
18.desc: Destroy a soul owned by another player.

19.name: Forgiver's Soul
19.desc: Discard a boss before another player is about to eliminate it.

20.name: Vestigial Soul
20.desc: Survive two attacks that would have killed you on the same turn.

21.name: Soul of Remorse
21.desc: Buy a Relic from the shop and lose it in the same turn.

22.name: Investor's Soul
22.desc: Spend 30 or more β on your turn.

25.name: Cancer Patient's Soul
25.desc: Have an HP of 8 or more.

26.name: Tank's Soul
26.desc: Take 10 or more damage on your turn without dying.

30.name: Sloth's Soul
30.desc: Do absolutely nothing for 3 turns consecutively. Dying resets this. "Imma Luigi! Number One!"

31.name: Tactician's Soul
31.desc: Kill an enemy before entering combat and kill another enemy after entering combat on the same turn.

32.name: Broken Soul
32.desc: You lost all the souls you had in one turn, what a bummer.

1.desc: Roll: 1-3: Nothing, Roll 4-6: reflect a relic/Ware played against you to attacker.

2.name: Inverted
2.desc: Roll: 1-3: reflect a relic/Ware played against you to attacker. Roll 4-6: Nothing.

1.desc: Roll: 1 +1 Hp, 2 +1 Atk, 3 Nothing, 4 +1 Roll (next roll), 5 -1 Roll (next roll), 6 -1 Hp
Pay 3β to deal 1 damage to an active enemy. "You want it? It's yours my friend."
Unmodifiable Roll: 1: Break the shovel (discard), 2: gain 1β, 3-4: nothing, 5: +1 Ware, 6: Gain a relic and discard

2.name: Golden
2.desc: Unmodifiable Roll: 1: Break the shovel (discard), 2: gain 3β, 3-4: Nothing, 5: +1 Ware, 6: Gain a relic and discard

3.name: Cursed
3.desc: Unmodifiable Roll: 1: Break the shovel (discard), 2: gain 2β, 3-4: Fight off top monster deck and discard, 5: +1 Ware, 6: Gain a relic and discard

1.desc: You gain +1 HP & ATK for the next 3 turns. Discard this on the 4th.

2.name: Military
2.desc: You gain +1 HP & +2 ATK for the next 3 turns. Discard this on the 4th.

3.name: Medical
3.desc: You gain +2 HP for the next 3 turns. Discard this on the 4th.

4.name: Experimental
4.desc: You gain +2 HP & ATK for the next 2 turns. Discard this on the 3rd.

5.name: Hyper
5.desc: You gain +1 HP, ATK, and dice rolls for the next 5 turns. Discard this on the 6th.

1.name: Bronze
1.desc: If you die on a dice roll of 1, you may negate death and end your turn.

2.name: Shiny
2.desc: If you die on a dice roll of 1-2, you may negate death and end your turn.

3.name: Polished
3.desc: If you die on a dice roll of 1-3, you may negate death and end your turn.

4.name: Gold
4.desc: You take no damage on an attack roll of 1.

5.name: Platinum
5.desc: You take no damage on attack rolls 1-2.

7.name: Urmgurn's Little Book of Treehopper Nymphs

1.desc: During a turn, if there is a dice roll of 3, you may force the next roll to be a 3.

2.name: Pristine
2.desc: During a turn, if there is a dice roll of 4, you may force the next roll to be a 4.

3.name: Sealed
3.desc: During a turn, if there is a dice roll of 5, you may force the next roll to be a 5.

4.name: Signed
4.desc: During a turn, if there is a dice roll of 6, you may force the next roll to be a 6.

5.name: Torn
5.desc: During a turn, if there is a dice roll of 1, you may force the next roll to be a 1.

1.desc: Put a counter on this. Spend 3 counters to recharge all other Relics and you may play an additional Ware.
Attack rolls hit all active enemies, provided it meets their RR.

2.name: Auto
2.desc: Odd numbered attack rolls hit all active enemies.

3.name: Sawed-Off
3.desc: Even numbered attack roll hit all active enemies.

4.name: Super
4.desc: Attack rolls of 6 have +1 DMG and hit all active enemies.

5.name: Overclocked
5.desc: Attack rolls of 6 have +1 DMG and hit all active enemies, but deal 1 DMG to yourself.

1.desc: When you die, discard this and receive another Relic.

2.name: Sparkly
2.desc: When you die, discard this and receive two Relics.

3.name: Pop-up
3.desc: When you die, discard this and receive another Relic and +2 Wares.

4.name: Holographic
4.desc: When you die, discard this and receive two Relics and +2 Wares.

1.desc: When you kill an enemy, put a counter on this. At 3 counters, remove them all and permanently gain 1 HP.

2.name: Crimson
2.desc: When you kill an enemy, put a counter on this. At 3 counters, remove them all and permanently gain 1 ATK.

3.name: Kali's Favorite
3.desc: When you kill an enemy, put a counter on this. At 4 counters, remove them all and permanently gain 1 HP & ATK.

1.desc: Gain +1 HP and ATK when any Jinx is on the board.

2.name: Sloppy
2.desc: Gain +2 HP when any Jinx is on the board,

3.name: French
3.desc: Gain +2 ATK when any Jinx is on the board.

4.name: 5-Minute
4.desc: Gain +2 HP and ATK when any jinx is on the board.

1.desc: Roll: 1-2: Gain 1 Ware, 3: Lose 2β, 4: Gain +1HP for turn, 5: Lose 1 Ware, 6: End turn
Spend 2 Counters to remove a Non-Boss type Enemy from the board
Prevent 1 damage or +1 to next Roll

2.name: Minty Fresh
2.desc: Prevent 2 damage or +1 ATK

1.desc: Force an enemy to lose its active effects, but gain +1 ATK.
+1 Hp, Enemies you kill drop +1β "Full of sugar and silicon!"
Choose one: Remove a Jinx OR Cancel your attack on an enemy. "You question the words of the mighty JIMMY?!"
Recharge another Relic.

2.name: Charged
2.desc: Recharge two other Relics.

3.name: Nuclear
3.desc: Recharge another Relic. You may also play another Ware.

1.desc: +1 HP.

2.name: I wonder what's for
2.desc: +2 HP.

1.name: Rotten
1.desc: +1 ATK.

2.name: Green
2.desc: Gain +1 HP every time you make 2 successful attack rolls in a row for this turn.

1.desc: All damage done to you is reduced to 1.
Turn an Attack Roll to a 6. If this roll was a 1, deal double damage.

1.name: Cockfighting
1.desc: When someone enters combat, guess who will win. If you are correct: gain 5β.

2.name: Drivers
2.desc: When a player has to roll for an activated effect: guess what they will roll unmodified. If correct: you may choose to cancel their effect. "I will turn this car right around mister!"

1.desc: The next Ware that is played effects all players.
Steal a random Ware from another player.

2.name: Steel
2.desc: Steal 2 random Wares from another player.

3.name: Carbon
3.desc: Steal a random Ware from every player.

1.name: Entropy
1.desc: Destroy this: Remove any enemy, Relic, or Soul card.

2.name: Order
2.desc: This turns into a soul card on use.

1.desc: Gain 1β. When any player rolls a 1, recharge this.
+1 to all of your attack rolls.

2.name: Bull Penis
2.desc: +1 ATK. +1 to all of your attack rolls. "You flip the fuck out over the fact that this is apparently a BULL PENIS CANE."

1.desc: Other players can't activate Relics during your turn.

2.name: Treacle
2.desc: Other players can't activate relics or play Wares during your turn.

3.name: Frijole
3.desc: +1 HP. Other players can't activate Relics or play Wares during your turn. "Yeah, you're practically indestructable now."

1.desc: After an attack roll of 6, roll again. If you land another 6, deal an additional 3 damage. "Armed with the MACHINE GUN, you are an unstoppable murdering machine."
You may buy shop Relics for 5β.
Gain 2β whenever you activate a Relic.
Whenever another player dies, you choose which Relic they discard.

2.name: Left
2.desc: Whenever another player dies, you gain any Wares or β they lose.

3.name: Eggplanted
3.desc: Whenever another player dies, you choose which Relic they discard. You also gain any Wares or β they lose.

1.desc: Add a counter to this. $ Remove 3 counters from this: kill a player or monster. $ Remove 6 counters from this: kill a boss. "Oooh right, my BURROW BLAST!"

36.name: Who has two thumbs and loves Hex Souls?

1.desc: Add up to 2 to any dice roll. "This guy!"
Force a player to play a Ware. This counts as one of their plays for the turn.
Activate your on-damage Relics without taking damage.
When any player rolls a 5, gain +1 Ware.

2.name: Deca
2.desc: When any player rolls a 5, gain +2 Wares.

1.desc: Choose an active enemy. You gain +1 of its highest stat.
Gain +1 Ware whenever an enemy is killed.

2.name: Mini
2.desc: Gain 3β whenever an enemy is killed.

3.name: Tall
3.desc: Gain +2 Wares whenever a boss is killed.

4.name: Mega
4.desc: Gain 3β whenever an enemy is killed. Gain +2 Wares whenever a boss is killed.

42.name: This for That and Those for These

1.desc: Whenever a player rolls a 2, steal a Relic from them and give them one of your Relics.

1.name: TV
1.desc: Discard all active enemies. You must fight an active enemy.

2.name: Garage
2.desc: You may block the access/functionality of any card for this turn. "This isn't the right remote either."

1.desc: This starts with 3 counters. $: Remove 1 counter, gain a Relic, but you are forced to fight this turn. If you die, discard the Relic you gained. This can only be done once per turn. At 0 counters, discard this.
If a Relic or Ware card you played has resulted against your favor, cancel it. "Fetch me a fire extinguisher. A good one, with the foam."
On your turn, gain 5β if a boss is on the board.
Gain +1 HP upon entering combat with an enemy with 4 HP or more.

2.name: Bachelor's
2.desc: Gain +2 HP upon entering combat with an enemy with 4 HP or more.

3.name: Master's
3.desc: Gain +3 HP upon entering combat with an enemy with 4 HP or more.

4.name: Forged
4.desc: Gain +1 HP upon entering combat with an enemy with 3 HP or more.

1.desc: Gain another Ware at the start of your turn.
After a successful attack roll, gain +1 to your next attack roll.
Upon killing an enemy, gain full HP. You may fight again during your turn.
All active enemies have -1 RR for one attack roll. If this roll is successful, the change is permanent.
The first time you take damage this turn, deal two damage to all active enemies.

1.name: Tax-
1.desc: After killing an enemy and gaining the rewards, roll. 1-3: Gain double the rewards. 4-6: Gain nothing.

2.name: Hex-
2.desc: After killing an enemy and gaining the rewards, roll. 1-4: Gain double the rewards. 5-6: Gain nothing.

3.name: Tex-
3.desc: After killing an enemy and gaining the rewards, roll. 1-5: Gain double the rewards. 6: Gain nothing. "YEEEEHAAWWWW!"

1.name: Red
1.desc: If an enemy has killed another player, you may now kill the enemy in 3 successful attack rolls, when its your turn.

2.name: Green
2.desc: Kill any non-boss enemy and gain half its rewards rounded down.

3.name: Yellow
3.desc: Steal 3β from another player. "Reeks of Garlic"

4.name: Purple
4.desc: Force a player to fight an enemy of your choosing.

5.name: Subservient
5.desc: When entering combat, control another enemy for one attack roll. Gain the victims ATK. If the attack roll misses, the enemy takes damage instead of you.

1.desc: +2 HP, but -1 to all attack rolls.

2.name: Pure
2.desc: +2 HP

3.name: Caustic
3.desc: +1 HP & ATK, but -1 to all attack rolls.

1.desc: Whenever another player gains a Relic, put a counter on this. $: Remove 3 counters, gain a Relic.
Choose a player or active enemy. They take double damage for the first three attack rolls this turn. "Is this...? Mon DIEU!"

1.name: Tiny
1.desc: This becomes a copy of any non-Affinity Relic in play until the end of the turn.

2.name: Big
2.desc: This becomes a permanent copy of any non-Affinity Relic in play.

1.desc: Double the effect of the next Ware that is played.
When any player rolls a 3, recharge a Relic.

1.name: Defaced
1.desc: Whenever you roll a 2, you may turn it into a 3.

2.name: Deformed
2.desc: Whenever you roll a 3, you may turn it into a 4.

3.name: Developed
3.desc: Whenever you roll a 4, you may turn it into a 5.

4.name: Whenever you roll a 5, you may turn it into a 6.
4.desc: Disfigured

1.name: Ankle
1.desc: When any player rolls a 1, gain +1 Ware.

2.name: Tube
2.desc: When any player rolls a 1, deal 1 damage to an active enemy.

3.name: Knee-high
3.desc: When any player rolls a 1, gain 3β.

4.name: Thigh-high
4.desc: When any player rolls a 1, you may reroll a Relic.

1.desc: Deal 2 damage to an active enemy, but take 1 damage.

2.name: Hyper
2.desc: Deal 3 damage to an active enemy, but take 1 damage.

3.name: Ultra
3.desc: Deal 4 damage to an active enemy, but take 2 damage.

1.desc: +1 ATK. On a roll of 6, deal 1 damage to another active enemy.

2.name: Sharpened
2.desc: +1 ATK. On a roll of 6, deal 2 damage to another enemy.

3.name: Double-edged
3.desc: +1 ATK. On a roll of 6, deal 1 damage to all other active enemies.

1.desc: Recharge a Relic at the end of your turn.
+1 HP. Other players can't directly damage you.
+5 ATK until the end of your turn. When you take damage, die. "Stop on your right foot, DON'T FORGET IT!"
At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to any player or active enemy.

2.name: Silver
2.desc: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to any two active enemies or players.

3.name: Golden
3.desc: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to any three active enemies or players.

1.desc: When you die, deal 2 damage to the attacking enemy or player.

1.name: Rusty
1.desc: End your turn. Ignores external card rules.

2.name: Crusty
2.desc: Gain 2β. You may end your turn, ending ignores external card rules.

3.name: Trusty
3.desc: You gain 1 Relic and end your turn. You may only play this at the start of your turn. if you "Must" fight on your turn, you can not play this.

4.name: Busty
4.desc: Gain +1 Ware. You may end your turn. if you "Must" fight on your turn, you can not play this. "Firmly grasp it"

1.desc: When drawing from any deck you may pull 3 and choose one of those 3, discarding the rest. "It contains the known universe"
At the start of your turn, put a counter on this. Spend 4 Counters: You may force any player to destroy their affinity and replace it with a new one, then discard this.

1.name: Piezoelectric
1.desc: When you take damage: you may recharge an item.

2.name: Endothermic
2.desc: When you take damage: the attacker gets -1 RR till the end of the turn.

3.name: Exothermic
3.desc: When you take damage: deal 1 non-fatal damage to your attacker.

1.name: Repel
1.desc: Prevent all damage for the next 2 attack rolls.

2.name: Mysterious Pink
2.desc: Heal to your max health. "It says cherry flavor, but it just tastes like chalk."

1.desc: If you were to roll, you may roll 4 die instead and pick one of the results as your own.

2.name: Diamond
2.desc: When rolling for multiple reward giving cards, you may roll again for a second reward from that card. The same reward can not be gained twice.

3.name: Cloudy
3.desc: When another player rolls for an effect, you may force them to reroll it.

1.desc: During combat, ignore the effects of all enemies for the first 2 attack rolls.

2.name: Padded
2.desc: During combat, ignore the effects of all enemies for the first 3 attack rolls.

3.name: Deafening
3.desc: During combat, ignore the effects of all enemies for the first 4 attack rolls.

1.desc: Discard this on use. Roll: 1: Take 2 damage, 2: Reroll an item you own, 3: gain 5β, 4: Nothing, 5: Gain +1 Ware, 6: Gain a Soul.

1.name: Poly-
1.desc: +1 to Dice Rolls

2.name: Oligo-
2.desc: Subtract 1 to any Dice Roll

3.name: Ptero-
3.desc: Subtract 2 to any Dice Roll.

1.name: Black Lace
1.desc: All enemies have -1 RR. "Must it be so revealing?"

2.name: Swim suit
2.desc: You gain +1 to your non-combat rolls. "Doesn't leave much to the imagination."

3.name: Red Velvet
3.desc: Gain +1β when defeating a normal enemy and +5β when defeating a boss type. "Does this make me look fat?"

4.name: String
4.desc: Gain +4β for every active enemy on the board when you don't fight on your turn, at the max of 12β per turn. "This is just too much, or too little to be more accurate."

1.desc: You may force a stage change.

1.name: Weighted
1.desc: When gained put 3 counters on this. You may decide the result of any dice roll. Once out of counters discard this.

2.name: Russian
2.desc: Put a counter on this at the start of your turn at the max of 3. On use spends all counters: Pick a player to roll X times (X being counters spent). If they roll a 1 they die and you gain their penalties.

1.desc: You may initiate a vote to break a single rule for one turn. Souls may not be gained this way. Discarded when used.
Throw an 8-sided die for your attack rolls. "How do I shot web?"

2.name: Dark
2.desc: Throw an 8-sided die for your attack rolls. Rolls 7-8 deal +1 damage. "How do I shot web?"

1.desc: Discard one soul from every player including yourself. Discard this.

2.name: Gluttonous
2.desc: Discard two souls from every player including yourself. Discard this.

1.desc: Gain a glitch card and give it to any player of your choosing.
First use saves and pauses a Ware effect. Using this again allows you to resolve it at your discretion.

2.name: Pristine
2.desc: First use saves the most recent "action" and pauses it. Using this again allows it to resolve at your discretion.

3.name: Faulty
3.desc: Change the target of any item to another player at random.

1.desc: If another player owns a Relic of the same type (as in regardless of prefix) as you, you may take it from them (Reforge Rules still apply!).
Choose a player, roll to effect both of you: 1-3: gain 10β, 4-6: discard this.
Discard a ware and add a counter to this. Remove 4 counters to gain a Relic.

2.name: Expert's
2.desc: Discard a ware and add a counter to this. Remove 3 counters to gain a Relic.

3.name: Magic
3.desc: Discard a ware and add a counter to this. Remove 4 counters to reroll your Affinity.

1.desc: You may re-roll any dice roll.
Increase HP or ATK by +1 for this turn.

2.name: Boiled
2.desc: Increase ATK or dice rolls by +1 for this turn.  "Delicious!"

3.name: Grilled
3.desc: Increase HP or ATK by +2  for this turn. "Savory!"

4.name: Smoked
4.desc: Increase HP or dice rolls by +1 for this turn. "Smokey!"

5.name: Sharp
5.desc: Increase ATK by +2 but decrease HP by -1 for this turn. "Unappetizing!"

1.desc: After a successful attack on an enemy, heal or gain 1 HP. "SCRAPE and LICK!"
When a boss is on the board, roll at the beginning of your turn. 1-3: +1 ATK, 4-6: +1 to all dice rolls.
Discard any single active enemy, shop item, or jinx.

2.name: Dubious
2.desc: Discard all active enemies, shop items, or jinxes.

3.name: Specialized
3.desc: You may morph any one of your relics or a jinx into a new one.

1.desc: When pulling from the top from any deck, you may pull an additional card from that deck. Choose one of the two and discard the other.

2.name: Superior
2.desc: When pulling from the top of any deck, you may pull two additional cards from that deck. Choose one of them and discard the rest.

3.name: Voodoo
3.desc: When another player gains a relic, you may start a vote to discard and replace it.

1.desc: Cost: 3β With an unmodified roll: 1-2: Gain 2β. 3-6: Gain 6β.

2.name: Gilded
2.desc: Cost: 5β. With an unmodified roll: 1-4: Nothing. 5-6: Gain a Relic.

3.name: Bastardized
3.desc: Cost: 2β. With an unmodified roll: 1-3: Lose half your β. 4-6: Double your β.

1.desc: Passively: You have -1 HP. You may play this in reaction to a death and prevent it, ends the active players turn.

2.name: Saints
2.desc: You may skip your turn (forfeighting any items) and gain a relic on your next turn. You can not charge this on the turn you gain the relic in, but it can be charged by other items.

1.desc: You may be requested/may request to give/take HP to another player, if both parties agree.

2.name: Field
2.desc: At the initiation of any fight, you may take 1 HP from any enemy on the board and give it to another.

1.desc: Draw 3 Relics from the Relic deck (without duplicates) and pick one. The Relic you choose will become your Affinity.
When any player rolls a 2, gain 3β. Each time another player dies, gain a Ware.

2.name: Bloodied
2.desc: When any player rolls a 2, gain 2β. Each time another player dies, deal 1 damage to an active enemy.

3.name: Golden
3.desc: When any player rolls a 2, gain 3β. Each time another player dies, gain 3β.

1.desc: Heal 1 HP on any player or enemy.
Add or subtract 1 to any dice roll.

2.name: Malevolent
2.desc: Add 1, or subtract 2 to any dice roll.

3.name: Benevolent
3.desc: Add 2, or subtract 1 to any dice roll.

4.name: Balanced
4.desc: Add or subtract 2 to any dice roll.

1.desc: Upon death: after paying penalties, gain +1 Relic.
In response to a roll, you may force a player to roll again for a higher number, lower numbers must be rerolled again.

2.name: Cursed
2.desc: In response to a roll, you may force a player to roll again for a lower number, higher numbers must be rerolled again.

3.name: Spare
3.desc: In response to a roll, you may roll again and add the result rounded down to your current roll.

1.desc: Force a stage change. Stage effects are twice as effective for you, where applicable.

2.name: Shaped
2.desc: You may force up to two stage changes. Stage effects are twice as effective for you, where applicable.

1.name: Turtle
1.desc: For the next 3 attack rolls, you are immune to damage, but have -1 to dice rolls. "Slow and steady wins the race."

2.name: Gastropod
2.desc: +1 ATK and -1 to dice rolls for 3 attack rolls. "Slow, but armed with deadly venom."

3.name: Scallop
3.desc: For the next 3 attack rolls, you are immune to damage. After that, take double damage until the end of your turn "Why must I be so delicious?!"

4.name: Nautilus
4.desc: You are immune to damage and have +1 for your next attack roll. "Defensive and fast, but not much else."

5.name: Chocolate
5.desc: For the next 3 attack rolls, gain +2 HP for every damage you take. Lose your extra health at the end of your turn. "Yeah, I eat whatever falls off me. So what?"

1.desc: Spend 8β to gain +1 HP or ATK until the end of your turn.

2.name: Snazzy
2.desc: Spend 7β to gain +1 HP or ATK until the end of your turn.

3.name: Ripped
3.desc: Spend 9β to gain +1 HP or ATK until the end of your turn.

4.name: Battle
4.desc: Spend 10β to gain +2 HP or ATK until the end of your turn.

5.name: Casual
5.desc: Spend 8β to gain +1 HP or +1 to dice rolls until the end of your turn.

1.desc: Steal 1β from another player. If they don't notice, you may steal another 2β from them. If they notice, return their β.

Pick an active enemy. They are placed into your hand and you may fight them on your turn whenever you want. Using the jar on another enemy will replace your held one and discard them. If you die to your held enemy, discard them.
You have +2 HP permanently. "Hexagons are the bestagons."

2.name: Five-Sided
2.desc: Draw a Glitch card, this is now your passive Affinity.

3.name: Seven-Sided
3.desc: Draw 3 Glitch cards and pick from one of them to be your passive Affinity.

1.name: Buffer Overflowed
1.desc: Wares dropped by enemies are converted to relics. Activated items (including reaction ware) are all discharged at the start of your turn.

2.name: Buffer Underflowed
2.desc: When another player dies you gain what they lost. Any Relic gained outside of the shop and from this card are converted to wares.

1.desc: When the game begins, start a stopwatch. At 5 minutes, gain 10β. At 10 minutes, gain 3 wares. At 15 minutes, gain +1 ATK. At 25 minutes, gain +1 HP. Gain a Relic for every 5 minutes past 25.

1.name: Ointment
1.desc: +1HP for this turn.

2.name: Charge Pack
2.desc: Charge any item.

3.name: Charge Pack
3.desc: Charge any item.

4.name: Petrifying Spray
4.desc: Missed attack rolls don't hurt you for 2 rolls.

5.name: Emergency Medical Kit
5.desc: Heal to full health.

7.name: Debugger
7.desc: Remove a jinx from the board.

8.name: Glitch!
8.desc: Adds a Jinx to the board. You must play this when obtained.

10.name: Pacemaker
10.desc: If you were to die, roll: 1-5 Nothing. 6: Prevent death and end your turn.

11.name: Rock Bottom
11.desc: Take no damage on missed attack rolls of 1. 'Nice ass'

12.name: Underware
12.desc: Negate the first instance of damage on your turn.

16.name: Double Shot Espresso
16.desc: Take another turn after your turn. (Cannot stack)

18.name: You'll Feel A Pinch
18.desc: Steal 1 HP from the current Enemy being fought and heal 1 HP.

19.name: Emergency Blood Bag
19.desc: If you were to die, prevent it and end turn with 1 HP.

20.name: Doctor's Note
20.desc: If forced into a fight +1 HP for turn.

22.name: How 'bout No?
22.desc: Cancel the effect of a relic.

23.name: Stop!
23.desc: Cancel the effect of a ware.

24.name: Giant Mush
24.desc: Roll: 1-2: Take 1 damage. 3-4: +1 HP until the end of your turn. 5-6: +2 HP until the end of your turn.

25.name: Mystical Mush
25.desc: Roll: 1-2: Reroll a Relic. 3-4: Reroll any amount of your Relics. 5-6: Reroll all of your Relics.

26.name: Transmute
26.desc: Gain +1 HP until the end of your turn, and gain another Ware.

27.name: Transmute
27.desc: Gain +1 HP until the end of your turn, and gain another Ware.

29.name: Wait, What?
29.desc: For items that you 'choose' the effect of, you may force them to choose something else.

31.name: Neurogenesis
31.desc: You may reroll any one of your items, or reroll your Affinity.

32.name: Doorknob
32.desc: Force a stage change. 'Did you check if it was unlocked?'

33.name: Expired Library Card
33.desc: Force a stage change. 'An old tried and true trick.'

34.name: Pet Door
34.desc: Force a stage change. 'How'd you fit through there?'

36.name: User Backup
36.desc: Remove all of a players Glitch cards.

37.name: System Restore
37.desc: Remove all Glitch cards in play

38.name: Spike the Finger Monster
38.desc: Deal 1 DMG to any player or monster.

39.name: Glog the Finger Monster
39.desc: Deal 1 DMG to any player or monster.

40.name: Geez the Finger Monster
40.desc: Deal 1 DMG to any player or monster.

41.name: Saurn the Finger Monster
41.desc: Deal 1 DMG to any player or monster.

42.desc: Deal 1 DMG to any player or monster.

43.desc: Deal 1 DMG to any player or monster.

44.desc: Deal 1 DMG to any player or monster.

46.name: Mooj the Finger Monster
46.desc: Deal 1 DMG to any player or monster.

47.name: Quaz the Finger Monster
47.desc: Deal 1 DMG to any player or monster.

48.name: Gingerbread Man's Blessing
48.desc: +1 to ATK and Dice rolls for this turn. 'Hokay!'

51.name: Run As Administrator
51.desc: +1 to ATK, Dice Rolls, and HP.

52.name: Plastic Building Brick
52.desc: If another player rolls a 1: you may deal 1 damage to them.

53.name: Fragmented Sword
53.desc: Attack rolls less than 4 have +1 ATK.

55.name: Sloppy Seconds
55.desc: Deal 1 damage to any enemy, reward goes to you regardless of whos turn it is.

56.name: Carpet Bomber
56.desc: Deal 1 DMG to all current Enemies

57.name: Octogon
57.desc: Cancel the effect of a relic.

58.name: Cease and Desist
58.desc: Cancel the effect of a ware.

59.name: Ghillie Suit
59.desc: If you miss your first attack roll during your turn, take no damage.

60.name: Black Mush
60.desc: Roll: 1-2: -1 to dice rolls until the end of your turn. 3-4: +1 ATK until the end of your turn. 5-6: +1 to dice rolls until the end of your turn.

61.name: Mystical Mush
61.desc: Roll: 1-2: Reroll a Relic. 3-4: Reroll any amount of your Relics. 5-6: Reroll all of your Relics.

62.name: Transmogrify
62.desc: Gain +1 ATK until the end of your turn, and gain another Ware.

63.name: Transmogrify
63.desc: Gain +1 ATK until the end of your turn, and gain another Ware.

64.name: Butterfly Knife
64.desc: Kill a player. 'I'll see you in hell... you handsome rogue!'

66.name: The Book of All Things Sharp
66.desc: Roll: 1-3: deal 1 damage to any enemy. 4-6: deal 1 damage to yourself. 'Knives, blades, and all things pointy!'

67.name: Sudoku Book
67.desc: Deal 1 damage to yourself and an enemy

68.name: Ram Manipulator
68.desc: Force any player to gain a Glitch card.

69.name: Identity Fraud
69.desc: Become the recipient of any played Ware card.

70.name: Bloodied Battery
70.desc: You may recharge a Relic after killing an enemy.

96.name: Lockpick
96.desc: Steal an item from any player.

97.name: Skeleton Key
97.desc: Get an item from the shop for free.

98.name: Roll: 1-2: Gain 2β 3-4: Gain 1 Ware 5-6: Gain 2 Wares.
98.desc: Roll: 1-2: Gain 2β 3-4: Gain 1 Ware. 5-6: Gain 2 Wares.

100.name: Rusty Gear
100.desc: When another player rolls a 3 you may add or remove 1 to it. (not applicable to combat rolls)

101.name: Old Pocket
101.desc: When any player rolls a 1, gain 1β.

102.name: Data Miner
102.desc: On your turn you may steal 1β from another player

103.desc: Gain +1β when a Bone gaining card is played.

104.name: Get Boned
104.desc: Cancel the effect of an item.

105.name: Ctrl + Z
105.desc: Cancel the effect of an item.

106.name: Spotted Mush
106.desc: Roll: 1: Lose all your β. 2-5: Gain 10β. 6: Double your β.

107.name: Mystical Mush
107.desc: Roll: 1-2: Reroll a Relic. 3-4: Reroll any amount of your Relics. 5-6: Reroll all of your Relics.

110.name: Scalpers Kit
110.desc: Multiply your wares by how many wares you own.

111.name: Communism
111.desc: Collect β from all players and share them evenly across all players. 'Loose' change goes to who played this.

112.name: A Soul!
112.desc: Gain a Soul! (Counts as a Ware play)

113.name: Food Stamp
113.desc: If you have no β at the end of your turn, gain 5β.

114.name: Senior Discount
114.desc: Any action that costs more than 1β now has -1β to its price.

115.name: Can of Paint
115.desc: Change the result of a dice roll to the number of your choosing.

116.name: Can of Gold Paint
116.desc: Double the β reward of an active enemy.

1.desc: When you <PM>: <E>.

2.desc: When another player <PM>: <E>.

3.desc: When an enemy <EM>: <E>.

4.desc: When a jinx enters play: <E>.

5.desc: When you kill an enemy: <E>.

6.desc: When another player kills an enemy: <E>.

10.desc: When a player gains a soul: <E>.

11.desc: Do as I say where possible, charge is reduced to 1. Do this:

1.desc: get(s) hurt

2.desc: heal(s)

3.desc: gain(s) a Ware

4.desc: get(s) a β

5.desc: gain(s) a Relic

1.desc: gets hurt

2.desc: gets healed

3.desc: hurt by an item

4.desc: dies

5.desc: gets discarded

8.desc: takes more than <X3> damage on the same attack roll

1.desc: heal <X2>

2.desc: take <X2> damage

3.desc: the currently attacked enemy (where applicable) gets healed <X2>

4.desc: a random player takes <X2> damage

5.desc: the player to your <DIR> takes <X2> damage

7.desc: roll a die, if the value is <X6>: Gain <X2> Relic(s). Reduces Glitch charge to 1

8.desc: roll a die, if the value is <X6>: Gain <X2> Ware(s). Reduces Glitch charge to 1

9.desc: put a jinx on the board

10.desc: the active player discards a relic

11.desc: the player to your <DIR> takes <X3> of your wares at random

12.desc: the player to your <DIR> may take one of your Relics. Reduces Glitch charge to 1

13.desc: you may take a Relic from a random player. Reduces Glitch charge to 1

14.desc: gain a Glitch card. Reduces Glitch charge to 1

15.desc: A random player gains a Glitch card. Reduces Glitch charge to 1

1.name: Common Imp
1.desc: If this damages a player, draw a Ware and use it on the attacking player.

2.name: Uncommon Imp
2.desc: If this damages a player, draw a Relic and use it on the attacking player.

3.name: Treasure Imp
3.desc: This will leave after five attack rolls.

4.name: Imp's Stash
4.desc: If no Imps are in play, claim 3 Wares of your choosing. Otherwise, any Imp in play will have an additional 3 Wares of the same type added to their reward.

5.name: Imp Thief
5.desc: If this defeats a player, you must discard an additional Ware card.

6.name: Imp Queen
6.desc: If any Imps are in play, they gain +1 to RR and +1 to ATK

7.name: Imp Guard
7.desc: If the "Imp Queen" is in play you must attack this card first.

8.name: Imp Swarm
8.desc: If this is defeated in less than 3 moves, double the reward.

9.name: Imp Egg
9.desc: When revealed, decide: Spare and keep this enemy in your relics for a passive +2 HP; Kill this enemy for a permanent +1 ATK. "Fate in the palm of your hand."

10.name: Devilchild
10.desc: If the attacking player dies, any discarded relic is added to this enemy's reward pool. "Damned kids."

11.name: Devil
11.desc: If a "Devilchild" is killed with this in play, add +1 ATK permanently.

12.name: Overseer
12.desc: Gains +1 RR for each "Demonic" type enemy active. "It wont stop staring at me."

13.name: Overseer II
13.desc: Gains +1 ATK for each soul all players have collected. "It wont stop biting me."

14.name: Reaper
14.desc: When this is defeated, steal all souls from a player of your choosing.

15.name: Soul Gambler
15.desc: If your roll misses, roll 2 dice: Snake eyes: Discard all your souls and this enemy, 3-6: take 1 damage, 7-11:  +1β, Boxcars: gain 2 souls, discard this enemy. "50/50 odds against."

16.name: Con Man
16.desc: Decide: Discard a soul and roll: 1-4: Discard this enemy, 5: +2 Relics, 6: +2 Souls; Discard this enemy. "We got the hottest deals from the hottest places in the Six Dimensions!"

17.name: Static Television
17.desc: "I used to be the scariest kid on the block."

18.name: Imp Mother
18.desc: When this is defeated, cover all available enemy slots with demonic enemies. "Hell hath no fury..."

19.name: Cannibal
19.desc: When revealed, all Demonic enemies are discarded. For each discarded enemy and soul they carry, this gains +1 to all stats.

1.name: Moon Jester
1.desc: No Wares may be played during this fight.

2.name: Cookie Cutter
2.desc: On a roll of 1, the attacking player loses -1 HP permanently (minimum 1).

3.name: Moon Cheese
3.desc: When revealed, decide: Eat the cheese for +2 HP but -1 to attack rolls permanently; Discard this. "Can mold even survive in space?"

1.name: Glowing... Thing
1.desc: "It's bright, it's ugly, it's... something."

2.name: Statue of a Man
2.desc: When defeated, draw a "Devil" to put here. Fight it. "Prove your strength."

3.name: Statue of a Lady
3.desc: When defeated, draw an "Angel" to put here. Fight it. "Prove your spirit."

4.name: Angel
4.desc: If a non-Demonic enemy is killed with this in play, add +1 ATK permanently. "Not the guardian type."

5.name: White Rabbit
5.desc: When this dies, replace this with an "Angel". It gains +2 ATK and starts combat with the next player to deal damage.

6.name: Halo
6.desc: If you miss a roll, end your turn. "I'm blind!"

7.name: Holy Imp
7.desc: This counts as both an Imp and Angelic enemy. "Not quite sure where to put this one."

8.name: Weeping Child
8.desc: Every time an Angelic enemy is killed, add a counter. When this reaches 3, kill the player who added the final counter. This cannot be covered, only discarded by force.

11.name: Purifying Hand
11.desc: If this hurts a player, exchange a non-Angelic Relic for an Angelic Relic.

1.desc: +1 to attack rolls and HP. "Don't give it a name!"

2.name: Moody
2.desc: +2 to attack rolls. "Let ME show you how to do it."

3.name: Cute
3.desc: +2 to HP. "Stop starin' at me with that big ol' eye."

4.name: Gifted
4.desc: +2 to attack rolls and HP. "You're alright, kid."

1.desc: Replace any active enemy with a Demonic enemy. "Verizon is not associated with any demonic presence."

2.name: Ear-Piercing
2.desc: Replace all active enemies with Demonic enemies. "AAAAAAAAAAAAAAGH!"

1.desc: Open all enemy slots, fill each with a Demonic enemy.

2.name: Uninteresting
2.desc: Open one enemy slot, draw a Demonic enemy for it. "Hey, Greg."

1.desc: Kill any non-Demonic, non-boss enemy. Replace it with a Demonic enemy. Discard This. "Scared myself half to death."

2.name: Comically Large
2.desc: Kill any non-Demonic enemy below 2 souls and replace it with a Demonic enemy. Discard this. "I'm on the neighborhood watchlist now."

3.name: Tiny
3.desc: Replace any non-Demonic, non-boss enemy with a Demonic enemy. Discard this. "Gave that mouse a heart attack."

1.desc: Demonic enemies lose -1 RR when you start combat. "Bow down."

1.name: Burnt
1.desc: Add a counter, use 1 to deal 1 damage to any non-boss enemy. "0."

2.name: Bronze
2.desc: Add a counter, use 2 to deal 1 damage to any enemy. "60."

3.name: Silver
3.desc: Add a counter, use 2 to deal 2 damage to any non-boss enemy. "120."

4.name: Gold
4.desc: Add a counter, use 3 to deal 2 damage to any enemy. "250."

5.name: Devil's
5.desc: Add a counter, use 4 to deal 3 damage to any enemy. "500."

6.name: Tormented
6.desc: Add a counter, use 5 to kill any enemy. "1000."
